statements.select: select * from ProduceInDepotDetail where ProduceInDepotId in(select ProduceInDepotId from ProduceInDepot where ProduceInDepotDate between #startdate# and #enddate#) and (PronoteHeaderId >=#startpronoteid# or #startpronoteid# is null) and (PronoteHeaderId <=#endpronoteid# or #endpronoteid# is null)
